content: this cute skull toque uses stranded colour work in an easy-to-remember repeat making it a fairly quick knit just in time for halloween materials needed - approximately 90 yards of black worsted weight yarn - approximately 45 yards of white worsted weight yarn - 5mm us 8 16 circular needles - 4mm us 6 16 circular needles - 5mm us 8 dpns - tapestry needle scissors measuring tape - pom pom or pom pom maker optional skills needed - knit purl k2together slip-slip-knit - stranded colour work - ability to read a colour work chart finished size 9 1/2 24 cm across 9 1/2 24 cm tall
